text: The River Forth is a river in Scotland. The source is Loch Ard, in Kinlochard. The river flows through the city of Stirling, and the city of Edinburgh is on the south of the Firth of Forth estuary. Image:Edinburgh-Firth of Forth.jpg|The Firth of Forth (where the river flows into the sea). The city in the foreground is Edinburgh Image:Forth bridges 2005-06-17 02.jpg|The railway bridge over the River Forth Category:Rivers of Scotland Category:Fife Category:West Lothian
title: River Forth
